availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert M. Dodd (Warren County, Kentucky, plasterer.)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, plasterer. Warren County, Kentucky, native. Son of William Dodd and Sarah Dodd. Married to Julia E. Beckham Dodd in Warren County, Kentucky, in January 1856. Father of Victoria Dodd and Allen Dodd. Plasterer in Warren County in 1850. Plasterer in Warren County in 1860. Farmer in Warren County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No 2, p. 101B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District No 2, p. 575.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Bowling Green, p. 62B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Warren County, KY, February 1864, p. 81.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Warren County Marriages, Film #000339892, p. 119.
"M. Robert Dodd." The Courier-Journal, April 9, 1914, p. 3.
"Robert Major Dodd (1833-1914)," Find A Grave, Memorial #167945872, Accessed June 30, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/167945872.
